cards.name: As a customer I want to connect to the in store wifi with the minimum of interaction
Account - As a customer I want the option to be able to set up an account, with only an email and password
Account - As a customer who has previously created an account I want to be able to recover my account when I have forgotten my password
Account - As a customer I want to be able to start shopping right away  after downloading the app, without having logged in, so that I dont have to spend time creating an account

Account - As an anonymous customer I want the option to create an account before/after [TBD] payment so as to be able to save my card details against my account and enjoy the full JS shopping app experience

Account - As a customer who creates an account on a device that has a pseudo account created I want the history to be merged with my new account so that I can review previous purchases and benefit from my re-scan status built prior to creating the account

Account - As a customer whos used multiple devices anonymously and logs into one of them with an account created previously, I do not want the device history to be merged into my account as this could well be someone elses history
Account - As a customer I want to be able to update/amend my account details if required
As a customer I want to be able to check into a store manually if it can not be done automatically
As a customer I want to be able to access contextual help
As a customer I would like to be able to access FAQ documentation
As a first-time user of the app I want to be shown Getting Started overlays so that I can navigate the app easily
As a customer I would like to be able to locate my nearest Sainsburys
As a customer I want to be able to select and save my preferred/home store
Search - As a customer I would like to be able to view images and product detail of searched for items
List - As a customer I would like to be able to discard a previously planned "my next shop" in one action
List - As a customer I would like to be able to save a shopping list and work on another list
List - As a customer I would like to be able to add previously purchased items to another list in order to facilitate the creation and curation of my lists

cards.desc: This story involves synchronisation, merging, resolution of conflicts and managing multiple devices coming online, going offline, throughout the day.
cards.name: List - EPIC As a customer I would like to be able to manipulate my list whilst off-line
List - As a customer I would like to be able to delete a list from my library of lists
List - As a customer I would like to be able to return to a list I have created previously
List - As a customer I want to be able to copy items from one list to another
List - As a customer I would like to be able to browse offers when not in the store and add to my shopping list

cards.desc: We're not clear what favourites/usuals really are and what it means to edit the usuals so leaving this to unpack later...
cards.name: As a customer I would like to be able to remove items from my usuals/favourites
List - EPIC As a customer I would like to be able to share a list with another user so that [...]
Shop - As a customer I want to be reminded if I still have items on my shopping list when I check out so that I dont forget anything
Shop - As a customer I want the app to identify where I am shopping with minimum of interaction- auto check in
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to buy catch-weight product items so that Im not restricted and prevented from buying my five a day
Shop - As a customer I would like to be able to check out using a till if I'm unable to check out on the app
Shop - As a customer I would like to be able to enter the bar code manually if it will not scan so that I can register the product in my basket and avoid having to go through a manual checkout
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to identify any items requiring additional store colleague checks due to restrictions  (e.g. Think 25).
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to identify any items requiring tags removed before leaving the store because I may not know that a tag is even present.
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to see when I trigger a promotion when scanning items into my basket
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to shop against the next shop list so that I dont forget things
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to identify which items on my shopping list are located close together
Shop - As a customer, when in shopping mode, I want to know the location of a generic 'category' of items in the store so that I can then go and find specific items in that area.
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to search for and locate a product in store during a shop
Shop - As a customer I want to be informed of  potential promotion so that I do not miss out on offers
As a customer I want to be given a schematic by aisle location of items in my shopping list so that I can shop as quickly as possible and with ease
As a customer I want to be able to get visual directions to a product in store so that I can shop as quickly as possible and with ease
As a customer I want my items in my list to be grouped by aisle or other in store signage
As a customer I want to be able to get visual directions to facilities and departments in store e.g. Pharmacy  or Ready Meals
As a customer I want to be informed about special offers available in store today
As a customer I want to able to access bespoke Nectar offers through the app
As a customer I want to be able to use coupons (pay at till) so that I am not disadvantaged by being an app user
As a customer I want to be able to enter my card details and pay through the app so that I dont have to go to a POS
As a customer I want to be able to prove I have purchased items if challenged when exiting the store
As a customer I want to be able to get a refund if I required
As customer I want to be seen to have paid when using mobile payment
As a colleague (security team) I want to be able to see that a customer has paid if using mobile payment
As a customer I want to have the option of saving my card details so I don't have to re-enter them each time I wish to pay using the app
As  customer I want to be able to enter my Nectar card and receive my Nectar point allocation upon payment as if I were using the POS so that I am not disadvantaged by being an app user
As a customer I want to be able to pay at a till instead of mobile so that I can do complex transactions
As a customer I would like the option to print a receipt before exiting the store.
As a customer I want to be able to access an electronic receipt and be able to print it on a computer.
As a customer I want colleague discount to apply at the point of payment so that I am not disadvantaged by being an app user
As JS, I want to be able to ensure restricted item purchase is controlled
As a colleague, I want to be able to validate that the contents of a customers' app basket and their physical basket or trolley
As JS, I want to be able to control (enable/disable) activity on a customer account
As a customer, I want flexibility in how I am able to pay for my shopping
As someone using assistive technology I want the interface to make sense (Tags for speech reader etc.)
As a colleague, I want to be able to view and update customer account details
As a store colleague I want to be able to identify customers who have been flagged for a re-scan in order to avoid potential fraudulent behavior
As a store colleague I want a system that can flag customers for rescans based in order to avoid potential fraudulent behavior
[EPIC: STORE SERVICE MODEL] As a customer I want to be able to get a colleague to resolve problems if I'm unable to scan an item. (support model in store)
As a customer I want to be able to summon support through the app if I experience difficulties

As a store customer service desk colleague I want to have the option to be emailed all ISSA receipts for customers who have checked out in my store so that I can print for the customer if they request it
As a colleague I want to receive training on the app
As a colleague I want to be able to resolve customer queries and problems easily without having to refer to the Customer Care team

cards.desc: A new API will be required which will test all components within the web service. The return of the API will be a simple ok / not ok. The URL will then be checked at regular intervals using CA APM Cloud Monitor to ensure the service is running, and alert the support team in the event of failure / slow response.

As a colleague I want to be able to address any issues the app may have.

List - As a customer I want to be able to add generic category item to my list e.g. wine
Search - as a customer scanning an item into a list I want clear messaging to indicate what has happened when I scan an item that does not exist in the JS inventory so that I'm not confused
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to scan and add a product to my trolley when shopping in store so I can buy it
Search - As a customer I would like to be able to search Sainsbury's products and add items to my shopping list
Search - As a customer I want to be able to see all product images and details when adding items to my list
Shop - As a customer I want to be able to scan barcodes and have them correctly identified
Shop - As a customer I would like an item removed/crossed off my shopping list when I add it to my basket.
Shop -  As a customer I want to be able to remove items from my basket that I no longer want
Shop - As a customer I want to have a running total, promoted, price of the products in my basket  so that I can manage my spend and know what Im going to have to pay at checkout
Shop - As a customer I want to see a running total of all savings as I scan items to my basket
Search - As a customer I want to be able to scan a specific product (outside of the store environment) and add it to my list

Given a customer has added an age restricted item to their basket, I am able to approve purchase on their phone, provided they meet T25 criteria
Given a customer does not meet the T25 criteria, I am able to record the reason for refusal either on the phone or @ a till
Given a customer does not meet the T25 criteria, I am able to refuse purchase of that item on their phone and the customer is able to purchase the remainder of their basket
Given a customer has age restricted item(s) in their basket, they are able to pay for their basket wherever/however they choose (phone/card/cash/till etc)
Given a customer has added age restricted items to their basket, the receive a notification to seek colleague assistance to authorise the purchase
Given a customer has added an age restricted item to their basket, I am able to approve purchase @ a till, provided they meet T25 criteria
Given a customer does not meet the T25 criteria, I am able to refuse purchase of that item @ a till and the customer is able to purchase the remainder of their basket
Given there have been instances of age restricted item purchases, I am able to provide a report breakdown that categorises refusal reasons, in order to comply with legislation
Given I suspect fraudulent use on an ISSA account, I am able to prevent activity on that customer account
Given a customer has selected to pay for their basket (phone or @ till) the customer account should automatically be suspended
Given the customer has completed payment for their basket, their account should be automatically un-suspended
Given a customer account has become suspended, they should be provided with notification of this via a pop-up and advised to seek colleague assistance
Given an ISSA account Is suspended, I am able to identify the reasons for this and un-suspend
Given a customer has selected to pay for their basket, I want to be able to ensure they have not over scanned any products (I want this to be offered as a customer service)
Given a customer has selected to pay for their basket, I want to be able to ensure they have not under scanned any products (I want this to be offered as a customer service)
Given I am able to carry out a validation check, I want this process to be as fast and efficient as possible
Given I am able to carry out a validation check, I want to be able to do this and enable to the customer to pay wherever the customer chooses (phone or till)
Messaging when EAN does not exist
Messaging when network not available
Messaging when another error occurs

As a central user I want to be able to see and report on all transactions that are completed via the mobile wallet

As an acquirer, I want to be able to discern which payment channel a payment is completed through - I need to be able to separate mobile payments from normal store transactions as they will attract different levels of fees (MSC)

As an acquirer, I want to be able to discern which payment channel a payment is completed through - I need to be able to separate mobile payments from normal store transactions as they will are subject to different chargeback rules
As JS, we need to agree the MSC fees and chargeback policy with Worldpay, Barclaycard and Amex
As JS, I want customers to accept the terms of use for wi-fi access
As JS, I want customers to accept the terms of use for ISSA
As a customer, I want to be aware of any terms if use but with minimal disruption to my shopping journey
Given a customer wishes to use ISSA, they are able to connect to JS wifi very easily
